@wardyfella @SarahEgan5 I had someone tell me I should be ashamed of myself, that I’m a foetus murderer and also a woman and her three young daughters who brought us snacks and a home made poster! You get a mix but hopefully it’s worth it when we’re celebrating in two weeks ❤️

S/o to @Together4yes for being so respectful during this campaign. There could be yes posters with graphic & unsettling images of babies with anencephaly & other FFAs and sensationalist slogans. But there aren’t. Out of respect for the families who lived and live those stories

If you can’t canvas or hand out leaflets - wear your badges, t shirts, jumpers, stickers etc with pride. Have the difficult conversations and show people that true compassion for women lies in a yes vote @Together4yes #repeal

To say I’m scared of a no vote in this referendum is the understatement of the century. Worry and fear doesn’t win votes (take note no campaigners). Knocking on doors and having hard conversations does. Please get involved if you can @Together4yes #tfy #RepealTheEighth
